question: Posted By Elaine on September 29, 1998 at 09:29:06:I am having arrhythmias after eating sugar.  I have low blood sugar and my family has a history of diabetes.  After eating a moderate amount of sugar, my heart skips a beat and then palpitates for a second or two.  Is this dangerous or an indication of a serious heart problem?
title: Arrhythmia and Sugar
